text: The correlation revealed significant negative linear correlations between knowledge and attitude (r = −0.059, p = 0.378), as shown in Figure S1 . Figure S2 shows the correlation between knowledge and practice (r = 0.232, p < 0.001), and attitude and practice (r = −0.134, p = 0.045), as shown in Figure S3 . The result reaffirms a weak correlation between knowledge, attitude, and practice with respiratory tract infections KAP scores.
